parse.title: List of florilegia and botanical codices

text.*:
A timeline of illustrated botanical works to 1900.

Contents

  • 1 BCE
  • 2 1–100 CE
  • 3 301-400

  • 5 1301–1500
  • 6 1501–1600
  • 7 1601–1700
  • 8 1701–1800
  • 9 1801–1900
  • 10 References
